title: NRMA insurance logo
content:
I'm trying to find the font(s) used in this logo or something similar.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417081524/http:/typophile.com/files/image_259.jpg) | 141.8 KB |
author: Piratt227

comments.content:
'NRMA': maybe started from [Peignot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417081524/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/peignot)  
INSURANCE: ?  
'experience the difference': [Joey](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417081524/http:/www.fontsmith.com/fonts/fs-joey.cfm) FS
"INSURANCE" must be **Grange (Extra Bold)** by Headliners PreSett [1993] but I can't find a legitimate source for it.
